001package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL20;
006import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
007import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
008import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
009import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttributes;
010import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch;
011import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion;
012import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
013import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
014import com.badlogic.gdx.math.MathUtils;
015import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
016import squidpony.squidmath.NumberTools;
017
018/**
019 * A drop-in substitute for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch} that filters any colors used to tint text
020 * or images using a {@link FloatFilter}. The filter may have an effect on speed in some cases, but even moderately
021 * complex filters like {@link FloatFilters.YCbCrFilter} seem to perform perfectly well, spiking at above 1000 FPS on
022 * SparseDemo with a filter that changes parameters. This class should be preferred over SpriteBatch when using
023 * SquidLib's style of frequently changing the Batch color; as of libGDX 1.9.9, SpriteBatch is somewhat slower than
024 * FilterBatch when FilterBatch is using the default {@link FloatFilters#identityFilter}. This is because 1.9.9 changed
025 * SpriteBatch to do more work when setting a color, and FilterBatch keeps the older, faster way of color changing. It
026 * may be slower if used for Tiled map renderers in libGDX or for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.NinePatch}
027 * instances, which both need to reset a Color object frequently, but not much else in libGDX specifically needs the
028 * Color object {@link #getColor()} returns, and many things do fine with {@link #getPackedColor()}, which is faster.
029 * Note that for games that use 2D sprite graphics, there's very low overhead to 1.9.9's SpriteBatch, and it mostly has
030 * issues with overdraw (which every glyph of text drawn over a background contributes towards).
031 * <br>
032 * Most FloatFilter varieties don't have much overhead, and I encourage you to try some to quickly produce graphical
033 * effects in a game. As a simple example, {@link FloatFilters#grayscaleFilter} is a constant FloatFilter that makes
034 * all colors, well, grayscale; you could apply it during things like flashback sequences or when the player is dazed.
035 * <br>
036 * As a more complex example, changing the warmth of a color (as well as its lightness) is relatively easy with a
037 * {@link FloatFilters.YCwCmFilter} that adds to or subtracts from Cw (chromatic warmth) and may change Y (lightness).
038 * With that same filter, if the protagonist is partially blinded, you could set the multipliers for Cw and Cm
039 * (chromatic mildness; determines whether a color is closer to mild colors like green/yellow or bold colors like
040 * red/blue) to floats between 0.1 and 0.5 or so, which takes even intense colors and makes them diluted and grayish.
041 * You could also change Y to be brighter or darker depending on whether a bright light blinded the protagonist, or some
042 * mud was thrown in their eyes, etc.
043 * <br>
044 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 8/2/2018.
045 */
046public class FilterBatch implements Batch {
047    private static final int SPRITE_SIZE = 20;
048    
049    public FloatFilter filter;
050    
051    private final Mesh mesh;
052
053    final float[] vertices;
054    int idx;
055    Texture lastTexture;
056    float invTexWidth, invTexHeight;
057
058    boolean drawing;
059
060    private final Matrix4 transformMatrix = new Matrix4();
061    private final Matrix4 projectionMatrix = new Matrix4();
062    private final Matrix4 combinedMatrix = new Matrix4();
063
064    private boolean blendingDisabled;
065    private int blendSrcFunc = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
066    private int blendDstFunc = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
067    private int blendSrcFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
068    private int blendDstFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
069
070    private final ShaderProgram shader;
071    private ShaderProgram customShader;
072    private boolean ownsShader;
073
074    float color = Color.WHITE.toFloatBits();
075    private final Color tempColor = new Color(1, 1, 1, 1);
076
077    /** Number of render calls since the last {@link #begin()}. **/
078    public int renderCalls;
079
080    /** Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually. **/
081    public int totalRenderCalls;
082
083    /** The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far. **/
084    public int maxSpritesInBatch;
085
086    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, the default shader, and no changes in the
087     * color filter.
088     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram) */
089    public FilterBatch () {
090        this(1000, null, FloatFilters.identityFilter);
091    }
092
093    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, the default shader, and the given
094     * color filter.
095     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram, FloatFilter) */
096    public FilterBatch (FloatFilter filter) {
097        this(1000, null, filter);
098    }
099
100    /** Constructs a FilterBatch with one buffer, the default shader, and no changes in the color filter.
101     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram, FloatFilter) */
102    public FilterBatch (int size) {
103        this(size, null, FloatFilters.identityFilter);
104    }
105
106    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, the default shader, and the given
107     * color filter.
108     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram, FloatFilter) */
109    public FilterBatch (int size, FloatFilter filter) {
110        this(size, null, filter);
111    }
112
113    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
114     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
115     * respect to the current screen resolution.
116     * <p>
117     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
118     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
119     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 8191.
120     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the FilterBatch and must be disposed separately. */
121    public FilterBatch (int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader) {
122        this(size, defaultShader, FloatFilters.identityFilter);
123    }
124
125    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
126     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
127     * respect to the current screen resolution.
128     * <p>
129     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
130     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
131     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 8191.
132     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the FilterBatch and must be disposed separately. */
133    public FilterBatch (int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader, FloatFilter filter) {
134        // 32767 is max vertex index, so 32767 / 4 vertices per sprite = 8191 sprites max.
135        if (size > 8191) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't have more than 8191 sprites per batch: " + size);
136
137        Mesh.VertexDataType vertexDataType = (Gdx.gl30 != null) ? Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexBufferObjectWithVAO : Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexArray;
138
139        mesh = new Mesh(vertexDataType, false, size * 4, size * 6,
140                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.Position, 2, ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE),
141                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE),
142                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.TextureCoordinates, 2, ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0"));
143
144        projectionMatrix.setToOrtho2D(0, 0, Gdx.graphics.getWidth(), Gdx.graphics.getHeight());
145
146        vertices = new float[size * SPRITE_SIZE];
147
148        int len = size * 6;
149        short[] indices = new short[len];
150        short j = 0;
151        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 6, j += 4) {
152            indices[i] = j;
153            indices[i + 1] = (short)(j + 1);
154            indices[i + 2] = (short)(j + 2);
155            indices[i + 3] = (short)(j + 2);
156            indices[i + 4] = (short)(j + 3);
157            indices[i + 5] = j;
158        }
159        mesh.setIndices(indices);
160
161        if (defaultShader == null) {
162            shader = createDefaultShader();
163            ownsShader = true;
164        } else
165            shader = defaultShader;
166        this.filter = filter;
167    }
168
169    /** Returns a new instance of the default shader used by FilterBatch for GL2 when no shader is specified. */
170    static public ShaderProgram createDefaultShader () {
171        String vertexShader = "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
172                + "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
173                + "attribute vec2 " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
174                + "uniform mat4 u_projTrans;\n" //
175                + "varying vec4 v_color;\n" //
176                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
177                + "\n" //
178                + "void main()\n" //
179                + "{\n" //
180                + "   v_color = " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
181                + "   v_color.a = v_color.a * (255.0/254.0);\n" //
182                + "   v_texCoords = " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
183                + "   gl_Position =  u_projTrans * " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
184                + "}\n";
185        String fragmentShader = "#ifdef GL_ES\n" //
186                + "#define LOWP lowp\n" //
187                + "precision mediump float;\n" //
188                + "#else\n" //
189                + "#define LOWP \n" //
190                + "#endif\n" //
191                + "varying LOWP vec4 v_color;\n" //
192                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
193                + "uniform sampler2D u_texture;\n" //
194                + "void main()\n"//
195                + "{\n" //
196                + "  gl_FragColor = v_color * texture2D(u_texture, v_texCoords);\n" //
197                + "}";
198
199        ShaderProgram shader = new ShaderProgram(vertexShader, fragmentShader);
200        if (!shader.isCompiled()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error compiling shader: " + shader.getLog());
201        return shader;
202    }
203
204    @Override
205    public void begin () {
206        if (drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.end must be called before begin.");
207        renderCalls = 0;
208
209        Gdx.gl.glDepthMask(false);
210        if (customShader != null)
211            customShader.bind();
212        else
213            shader.bind();
214        setupMatrices();
215
216        drawing = true;
217    }
218
219    @Override
220    public void end () {
221        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before end.");
222        if (idx > 0) flush();
223        lastTexture = null;
224        drawing = false;
225
226        GL20 gl = Gdx.gl;
227        gl.glDepthMask(true);
228        if (isBlendingEnabled()) gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
229    }
230
231    @Override
232    public void setColor (Color tint) {
233        color = filter.alter(tint.toFloatBits());
234    }
235
236    @Override
237    public void setColor (float r, float g, float b, float a) {
238        color = filter.alter(NumberTools.intBitsToFloat(((int)(255 * a) << 24 & 0xFE000000)
239                | (int)(255 * b) << 16 | (int)(255 * g) << 8 | (int)(255 * r)));
240    }
241
242    public void setColor (final float color) {
243        this.color = filter.alter(color);
244    }
245
246    @Override
247    public void setPackedColor (final float color) {
248        this.color = filter.alter(color);
249    }
250
251    @Override
252    public Color getColor () {
253        final int intBits = NumberTools.floatToIntBits(color);
254        Color color = tempColor;
255        color.r = (intBits & 0xff) / 255f;
256        color.g = ((intBits >>> 8) & 0xff) / 255f;
257        color.b = ((intBits >>> 16) & 0xff) / 255f;
258        color.a = ((intBits >>> 24) & 0xff) / 255f;
259        return color;
260    }
261
262    @Override
263    public float getPackedColor () {
264        return color;
265    }
266
267    @Override
268    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height, float scaleX,
269                      float scaleY, float rotation, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
270        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
271
272        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
273
274        if (texture != lastTexture)
275            switchTexture(texture);
276        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
277            flush();
278
279        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
280        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
281        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
282        float fx = -originX;
283        float fy = -originY;
284        float fx2 = width - originX;
285        float fy2 = height - originY;
286
287        // scale
288        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
289            fx *= scaleX;
290            fy *= scaleY;
291            fx2 *= scaleX;
292            fy2 *= scaleY;
293        }
294
295        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
296        final float p1x = fx;
297        final float p1y = fy;
298        final float p2x = fx;
299        final float p2y = fy2;
300        final float p3x = fx2;
301        final float p3y = fy2;
302        final float p4x = fx2;
303        final float p4y = fy;
304
305        float x1;
306        float y1;
307        float x2;
308        float y2;
309        float x3;
310        float y3;
311        float x4;
312        float y4;
313
314        // rotate
315        if (rotation != 0) {
316            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
317            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
318
319            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
320            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
321
322            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
323            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
324
325            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
326            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
327
328            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
329            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
330        } else {
331            x1 = p1x;
332            y1 = p1y;
333
334            x2 = p2x;
335            y2 = p2y;
336
337            x3 = p3x;
338            y3 = p3y;
339
340            x4 = p4x;
341            y4 = p4y;
342        }
343
344        x1 += worldOriginX;
345        y1 += worldOriginY;
346        x2 += worldOriginX;
347        y2 += worldOriginY;
348        x3 += worldOriginX;
349        y3 += worldOriginY;
350        x4 += worldOriginX;
351        y4 += worldOriginY;
352
353        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
354        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
355        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
356        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
357
358        if (flipX) {
359            float tmp = u;
360            u = u2;
361            u2 = tmp;
362        }
363
364        if (flipY) {
365            float tmp = v;
366            v = v2;
367            v2 = tmp;
368        }
369
370        float color = this.color;
371        int idx = this.idx;
372        vertices[idx] = x1;
373        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
374        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
375        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
376        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
377
378        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
379        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
380        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
381        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
382        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
383
384        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
385        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
386        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
387        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
388        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
389
390        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
391        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
392        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
393        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
394        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
395        this.idx = idx + 20;
396    }
397
398    @Override
399    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth,
400                      int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
401        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
402
403        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
404
405        if (texture != lastTexture)
406            switchTexture(texture);
407        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
408            flush();
409
410        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
411        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
412        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
413        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
414        final float fx2 = x + width;
415        final float fy2 = y + height;
416
417        if (flipX) {
418            float tmp = u;
419            u = u2;
420            u2 = tmp;
421        }
422
423        if (flipY) {
424            float tmp = v;
425            v = v2;
426            v2 = tmp;
427        }
428
429        float color = this.color;
430        int idx = this.idx;
431        vertices[idx] = x;
432        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
433        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
434        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
435        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
436
437        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
438        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
439        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
440        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
441        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
442
443        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
444        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
445        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
446        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
447        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
448
449        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
450        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
451        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
452        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
453        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
454        this.idx = idx + 20;
455    }
456
457    @Override
458    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight) {
459        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
460
461        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
462
463        if (texture != lastTexture)
464            switchTexture(texture);
465        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
466            flush();
467
468        final float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
469        final float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
470        final float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
471        final float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
472        final float fx2 = x + srcWidth;
473        final float fy2 = y + srcHeight;
474
475        float color = this.color;
476        int idx = this.idx;
477        vertices[idx] = x;
478        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
479        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
480        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
481        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
482
483        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
484        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
485        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
486        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
487        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
488
489        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
490        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
491        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
492        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
493        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
494
495        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
496        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
497        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
498        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
499        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
500        this.idx = idx + 20;
501    }

503    @Override
504    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, float u, float v, float u2, float v2) {
505        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
506
507        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
508
509        if (texture != lastTexture)
510            switchTexture(texture);
511        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
512            flush();
513
514        final float fx2 = x + width;
515        final float fy2 = y + height;
516
517        float color = this.color;
518        int idx = this.idx;
519        vertices[idx] = x;
520        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
521        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
522        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
523        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
524
525        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
526        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
527        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
528        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
529        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
530
531        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
532        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
533        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
534        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
535        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
536
537        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
538        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
539        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
540        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
541        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
542        this.idx = idx + 20;
543    }
544
545    @Override
546    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y) {
547        draw(texture, x, y, texture.getWidth(), texture.getHeight());
548    }
549
550    @Override
551    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
552        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
553
554        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
555
556        if (texture != lastTexture)
557            switchTexture(texture);
558        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
559            flush();
560
561        final float fx2 = x + width;
562        final float fy2 = y + height;
563        final float u = 0;
564        final float v = 1;
565        final float u2 = 1;
566        final float v2 = 0;
567
568        float color = this.color;
569        int idx = this.idx;
570        vertices[idx] = x;
571        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
572        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
573        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
574        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
575
576        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
577        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
578        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
579        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
580        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
581
582        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
583        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
584        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
585        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
586        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
587
588        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
589        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
590        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
591        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
592        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
593        this.idx = idx + 20;
594    }
595
596    @Override
597    public void draw (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
598        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
599
600        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
601        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
602        if (texture != lastTexture)
603            switchTexture(texture);
604        else {
605            remainingVertices -= idx;
606            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
607                flush();
608                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
609            }
610        }
611        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
612
613        System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
614        idx += copyCount;
615        count -= copyCount;
616        while (count > 0) {
617            offset += copyCount;
618            flush();
619            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
620            System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
621            idx += copyCount;
622            count -= copyCount;
623        }
624    }
625
626    @Override
627    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y) {
628        draw(region, x, y, region.getRegionWidth(), region.getRegionHeight());
629    }
630
631    @Override
632    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
633        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
634
635        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
636
637        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
638        if (texture != lastTexture) {
639            switchTexture(texture);
640        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
641            flush();
642        }
643        final float fx2 = x + width;
644        final float fy2 = y + height;
645        final float u = region.getU();
646        final float v = region.getV2();
647        final float u2 = region.getU2();
648        final float v2 = region.getV();
649
650        float color = this.color;
651        int idx = this.idx;
652        vertices[idx] = x;
653        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
654        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
655        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
656        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
657
658        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
659        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
660        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
661        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
662        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
663
664        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
665        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
666        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
667        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
668        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
669
670        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
671        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
672        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
673        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
674        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
675        this.idx = idx + 20;
676    }
677
678    @Override
679    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
680                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation) {
681        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
682
683        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
684
685        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
686        if (texture != lastTexture) {
687            switchTexture(texture);
688        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
689            flush();
690
691        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
692        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
693        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
694        float fx = -originX;
695        float fy = -originY;
696        float fx2 = width - originX;
697        float fy2 = height - originY;
698
699        // scale
700        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
701            fx *= scaleX;
702            fy *= scaleY;
703            fx2 *= scaleX;
704            fy2 *= scaleY;
705        }
706
707        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
708        final float p1x = fx;
709        final float p1y = fy;
710        final float p2x = fx;
711        final float p2y = fy2;
712        final float p3x = fx2;
713        final float p3y = fy2;
714        final float p4x = fx2;
715        final float p4y = fy;
716
717        float x1;
718        float y1;
719        float x2;
720        float y2;
721        float x3;
722        float y3;
723        float x4;
724        float y4;
725
726        // rotate
727        if (rotation != 0) {
728            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
729            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
730
731            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
732            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
733
734            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
735            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
736
737            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
738            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
739
740            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
741            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
742        } else {
743            x1 = p1x;
744            y1 = p1y;
745
746            x2 = p2x;
747            y2 = p2y;
748
749            x3 = p3x;
750            y3 = p3y;
751
752            x4 = p4x;
753            y4 = p4y;
754        }
755
756        x1 += worldOriginX;
757        y1 += worldOriginY;
758        x2 += worldOriginX;
759        y2 += worldOriginY;
760        x3 += worldOriginX;
761        y3 += worldOriginY;
762        x4 += worldOriginX;
763        y4 += worldOriginY;
764
765        final float u = region.getU();
766        final float v = region.getV2();
767        final float u2 = region.getU2();
768        final float v2 = region.getV();
769
770        float color = this.color;
771        int idx = this.idx;
772        vertices[idx] = x1;
773        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
774        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
775        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
776        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
777
778        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
779        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
780        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
781        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
782        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
783
784        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
785        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
786        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
787        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
788        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
789
790        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
791        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
792        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
793        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
794        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
795        this.idx = idx + 20;
796    }
797
798    @Override
799    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
800                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation, boolean clockwise) {
801        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
802
803        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
804
805        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
806        if (texture != lastTexture) {
807            switchTexture(texture);
808        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
809            flush();
810
811        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
812        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
813        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
814        float fx = -originX;
815        float fy = -originY;
816        float fx2 = width - originX;
817        float fy2 = height - originY;
818
819        // scale
820        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
821            fx *= scaleX;
822            fy *= scaleY;
823            fx2 *= scaleX;
824            fy2 *= scaleY;
825        }
826
827        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
828        final float p1x = fx;
829        final float p1y = fy;
830        final float p2x = fx;
831        final float p2y = fy2;
832        final float p3x = fx2;
833        final float p3y = fy2;
834        final float p4x = fx2;
835        final float p4y = fy;
836
837        float x1;
838        float y1;
839        float x2;
840        float y2;
841        float x3;
842        float y3;
843        float x4;
844        float y4;
845
846        // rotate
847        if (rotation != 0) {
848            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
849            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
850
851            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
852            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
853
854            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
855            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
856
857            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
858            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
859
860            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
861            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
862        } else {
863            x1 = p1x;
864            y1 = p1y;
865
866            x2 = p2x;
867            y2 = p2y;
868
869            x3 = p3x;
870            y3 = p3y;
871
872            x4 = p4x;
873            y4 = p4y;
874        }
875
876        x1 += worldOriginX;
877        y1 += worldOriginY;
878        x2 += worldOriginX;
879        y2 += worldOriginY;
880        x3 += worldOriginX;
881        y3 += worldOriginY;
882        x4 += worldOriginX;
883        y4 += worldOriginY;
884
885        float u1, v1, u2, v2, u3, v3, u4, v4;
886        if (clockwise) {
887            u1 = region.getU2();
888            v1 = region.getV2();
889            u2 = region.getU();
890            v2 = region.getV2();
891            u3 = region.getU();
892            v3 = region.getV();
893            u4 = region.getU2();
894            v4 = region.getV();
895        } else {
896            u1 = region.getU();
897            v1 = region.getV();
898            u2 = region.getU2();
899            v2 = region.getV();
900            u3 = region.getU2();
901            v3 = region.getV2();
902            u4 = region.getU();
903            v4 = region.getV2();
904        }
905
906        float color = this.color;
907        int idx = this.idx;
908        vertices[idx] = x1;
909        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
910        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
911        vertices[idx + 3] = u1;
912        vertices[idx + 4] = v1;
913
914        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
915        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
916        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
917        vertices[idx + 8] = u2;
918        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
919
920        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
921        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
922        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
923        vertices[idx + 13] = u3;
924        vertices[idx + 14] = v3;
925
926        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
927        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
928        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
929        vertices[idx + 18] = u4;
930        vertices[idx + 19] = v4;
931        this.idx = idx + 20;
932    }
933
934    @Override
935    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float width, float height, Affine2 transform) {
936        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
937
938        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
939
940        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
941        if (texture != lastTexture) {
942            switchTexture(texture);
943        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
944            flush();
945        }
946
947        // construct corner points
948        float x1 = transform.m02;
949        float y1 = transform.m12;
950        float x2 = transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
951        float y2 = transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
952        float x3 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
953        float y3 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
954        float x4 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m02;
955        float y4 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m12;
956
957        float u = region.getU();
958        float v = region.getV2();
959        float u2 = region.getV2();
960        float v2 = region.getV();
961
962        float color = this.color;
963        int idx = this.idx;
964        vertices[idx] = x1;
965        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
966        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
967        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
968        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
969
970        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
971        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
972        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
973        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
974        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
975
976        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
977        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
978        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
979        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
980        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
981
982        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
983        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
984        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
985        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
986        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
987        this.idx = idx + 20;
988    }
989
990    @Override
991    public void flush () {
992        if (idx == 0) return;
993
994        renderCalls++;
995        totalRenderCalls++;
996        int spritesInBatch = idx / 20;
997        if (spritesInBatch > maxSpritesInBatch) maxSpritesInBatch = spritesInBatch;
998        int count = spritesInBatch * 6;
999
1000        lastTexture.bind();
1001        Mesh mesh = this.mesh;
1002        mesh.setVertices(vertices, 0, idx);
1003        mesh.getIndicesBuffer().position(0);
1004        mesh.getIndicesBuffer().limit(count);
1005
1006        if (blendingDisabled) {
1007            Gdx.gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1008        } else {
1009            Gdx.gl.glEnable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1010            if (blendSrcFunc != -1) Gdx.gl.glBlendFuncSeparate(blendSrcFunc, blendDstFunc, blendSrcFuncAlpha, blendDstFuncAlpha);
1011        }
1012
1013        mesh.render(customShader != null ? customShader : shader, GL20.GL_TRIANGLES, 0, count);
1014
1015        idx = 0;
1016    }
1017
1018    @Override
1019    public void disableBlending () {
1020        if (blendingDisabled) return;
1021        flush();
1022        blendingDisabled = true;
1023    }
1024
1025    @Override
1026    public void enableBlending () {
1027        if (!blendingDisabled) return;
1028        flush();
1029        blendingDisabled = false;
1030    }
1031
1032    @Override
1033    public void setBlendFunction (int srcFunc, int dstFunc) {
1034        setBlendFunctionSeparate(srcFunc, dstFunc, srcFunc, dstFunc);
1035    }
1036
1037    @Override
1038    public void setBlendFunctionSeparate(int srcFuncColor, int dstFuncColor, int srcFuncAlpha, int dstFuncAlpha) {
1039        if (blendSrcFunc == srcFuncColor && blendDstFunc == dstFuncColor && blendSrcFuncAlpha == srcFuncAlpha && blendDstFuncAlpha == dstFuncAlpha) return;
1040        flush();
1041        blendSrcFunc = srcFuncColor;
1042        blendDstFunc = dstFuncColor;
1043        blendSrcFuncAlpha = srcFuncAlpha;
1044        blendDstFuncAlpha = dstFuncAlpha;
1045    }
1046
1047    @Override
1048    public int getBlendSrcFunc () {
1049        return blendSrcFunc;
1050    }
1051
1052    @Override
1053    public int getBlendDstFunc () {
1054        return blendDstFunc;
1055    }
1056
1057    @Override
1058    public int getBlendSrcFuncAlpha() {
1059        return blendSrcFuncAlpha;
1060    }
1061
1062    @Override
1063    public int getBlendDstFuncAlpha() {
1064        return blendDstFuncAlpha;
1065    }
1066
1067    @Override
1068    public void dispose () {
1069        mesh.dispose();
1070        if (ownsShader && shader != null) shader.dispose();
1071    }
1072
1073    @Override
1074    public Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix () {
1075        return projectionMatrix;
1076    }
1077
1078    @Override
1079    public Matrix4 getTransformMatrix () {
1080        return transformMatrix;
1081    }
1082
1083    @Override
1084    public void setProjectionMatrix (Matrix4 projection) {
1085        if (drawing) flush();
1086        projectionMatrix.set(projection);
1087        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1088    }
1089
1090    @Override
1091    public void setTransformMatrix (Matrix4 transform) {
1092        if (drawing) flush();
1093        transformMatrix.set(transform);
1094        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1095    }
1096
1097    private void setupMatrices () {
1098        combinedMatrix.set(projectionMatrix).mul(transformMatrix);
1099        if (customShader != null) {
1100            customShader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1101            customShader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1102        } else {
1103            shader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1104            shader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1105        }
1106    }
1107
1108    protected void switchTexture (Texture texture) {
1109        flush();
1110        lastTexture = texture;
1111        invTexWidth = 1.0f / texture.getWidth();
1112        invTexHeight = 1.0f / texture.getHeight();
1113    }
1114
1115    @Override
1116    public void setShader (ShaderProgram shader) {
1117        if (drawing) {
1118            flush();
1119        }
1120        customShader = shader;
1121        if (drawing) {
1122            if (customShader != null)
1123                customShader.bind();
1124            else
1125                this.shader.bind();
1126            setupMatrices();
1127        }
1128    }
1129
1130    @Override
1131    public ShaderProgram getShader () {
1132        if (customShader == null) {
1133            return shader;
1134        }
1135        return customShader;
1136    }
1137
1138    @Override
1139    public boolean isBlendingEnabled () {
1140        return !blendingDisabled;
1141    }
1142
1143    public boolean isDrawing () {
1144        return drawing;
1145    }
1146    public FloatFilter getFilter() {
1147        return filter;
1148    }
1149
1150    public void setFilter(FloatFilter filter) {
1151        this.filter = filter;
1152    }
1153
1154}
